rules.name: Has_Changed_11
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9) AND NOT 5
rules.label: Has Changed

rules.name: Has_Changed4
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 23 OR 24 OR 25) AND NOT 22
rules.label: Has Changed

rules.name: Has_Changed8
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9) AND NOT 10
rules.label: Has Changed

rules.name: Has_Changed3
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22) AND NOT 19
rules.label: Has Changed

rules.name: Has_Changed5
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10) AND NOT 7
rules.label: Has Changed

rules.name: Has_Changed7
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12) AND NOT 13
rules.label: Has Changed

rules.name: Has_Changed1
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22 OR 23 OR 24 OR 25 OR 26 OR 27) AND NOT 28
rules.label: Has Changed

rules.name: Has_Changed2_0
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15) AND NOT(16)
rules.label: Has Changed

rules.name: Has_Changed2
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND NOT 6
rules.label: Has Changed

rules.name: Has_Changed6
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9) AND NOT 10
rules.label: Has Changed

rules.name: Has_Changed10
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10) AND NOT 6
rules.label: Has Changed

formulas.name: CheckUpIsNotEmpty
formulas.expression: AND({!ShowErrorcheckfinanziarioPersonal} = FALSE, {!ShowErrorCheckcheckassicurativoPersonal}= FALSE, {!ShowErrorCheckcheckprevidenzialePersonal}= FALSE, {!ShowErrorCheckwealthmanagement} =FALSE, {!ShowErrorchecktransazionalePersonal}= FALSE, {!ShowErrorCheckFinanziamentiPersonal} = FALSE, {!ShowErrorOperativitaPersonal}= FALSE, {!ShowErrorCheckPianoAzionePersonal}=FALSE, {!ShowErrorCheckAltreAttivitaPersonal}=FALSE, {!ShowErrorCheckPatrimoniale}=FALSE, {!ShowErrorIntro}=FALSE)

formulas.name: Formula_NotesRecordName
formulas.expression: IF(LEN("Note Check Up " + IF ({!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'PersonAccount', {!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.FirstName} + " " + {!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.LastName}, {!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.Name}) + " - " + {!MasterRecord.CRM_Now__c}) > 80, LEFT("Note Check Up " + IF ({!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'PersonAccount', {!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.FirstName} + " " + {!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.LastName}, {!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.Name}) + " - " + {!MasterRecord.CRM_Now__c},80),"Note Check Up " + IF ({!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'PersonAccount', {!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.FirstName} + " " + {!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.LastName}, {!Get_Current_Customer_Interview.CRM_Customer__r.Name}) + " - " + {!MasterRecord.CRM_Now__c})

formulas.name: Formula_SnapshotName
Formula_TipoRelazioneMembroNucleo1
Formula_TipoRelazioneMembroNucleo2
Formula_TipoRelazioneMembroNucleo3
Formula_TipoRelazioneMembroNucleo4
Formula_TipoRelazioneMembroNucleo5
FormulaShowError
formulas.expression: IF({!ShowErrorInfoIniziali} = TRUE, "Info Iniziali, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckPatrimoniale} = TRUE, "Check Patrimoniale, ",null) + IF({!ShowErrorcheckfinanziarioPersonal} = TRUE, "Check Finanziario, ",null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckcheckassicurativoPersonal} = TRUE, "Check Assicurativo, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckcheckprevidenzialePersonal} = TRUE, "Check Previdenziale, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckwealthmanagement} = TRUE, "Check Wealth Management, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorchecktransazionalePersonal} = TRUE, "Check Transazionale, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorOperativitaPersonal}= TRUE, "Check Operatività, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckFinanziamentiPersonal} = TRUE , "Check Finanziamenti, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckAltreAttivitaPersonal} = TRUE, "Altri temi affrontati durante l'incontro, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckPianoAzionePersonal} = TRUE, "Piano d'azione sul Cliente, ", null)

formulas.name: FormulaShowNotFilled
formulas.expression: IF({!ShowErrorInfoIniziali} = FALSE, "Info Iniziali, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckPatrimoniale} = FALSE, "Check Patrimoniale, ",null) + IF({!ShowErrorcheckfinanziarioPersonal} = FALSE, "Check Finanziario, ",null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckcheckassicurativoPersonal} = FALSE, "Check Assicurativo, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckcheckprevidenzialePersonal} = FALSE, "Check Previdenziale, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckwealthmanagement} = FALSE, "Check Wealth Management, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorchecktransazionalePersonal} = FALSE, "Check Transazionale, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorOperativitaPersonal}= FALSE, "Check Operatività, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckFinanziamentiPersonal} = FALSE , "Check Finanziamenti, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckAltreAttivitaPersonal} = FALSE, "Altri temi affrontati durante l'incontro, ", null) + IF({!ShowErrorCheckPianoAzionePersonal} = FALSE, "Piano d'azione sul Cliente, ", null)

formulas.name: FormulaStoricoNote

Per confermare il salvataggio delle informazioni raccolte e per consentire la creazione delle opportunità commerciali indicate, cliccare sul pulsante Avanti.

Viceversa, cliccare sul pulsante Indietro.
